articles.author: Francisco Guzman
articles.title: 'Vanderpump Rules' reunion Part 3: How to watch on TV, streaming - USA TODAY
articles.description: The "Vanderpump Rules" reunion features Tom Sandoval saying something that Andy Cohen promises will "upset every woman in America."
articles.content:
The "Vanderpump Rules Reunion": Pumped Up Addition finale is here! 
Part 3 of the three-part series will air on Bravo at 9 EDT/PDT Wednesday, and Peacock will stream the uncensored version of the re… [+1635 chars]
